ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Why have Rangers?
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t feel bad. My lvl 4 Druid hit harder and faster than my lvl 15 cleric! My cleric barely hits at all and when he does it s weak. mana goes so fast. Clerics
ygData.messageBody:
Don't feel bad. My lvl 4 Druid hit harder and faster than my lvl 15 cleric!
My cleric barely hits at all and when he does it's weak. mana goes so fast.
Clerics suck at melee much more than druids.
luv,
-Su

> This is true: I am a very pround L25 almost 26 druid and I can't hit for
> crap... LOL Druids are meant to be all around...fillers. We round out the
> group, cause we can do almost all of it (melee not included hehe)
> My 2Â¢
> Synthea Firestorm from Drinal server
>
